page.title: 03RENOVATIONS IN BARGEDDIE
page.content: In January 1984 workmen came to Bargeddie to renovate all the houses which had been built{in the {late thirties.}There was a lot of vandalism and a lot of things were stolen from the houses. In my house and a few others there were{concrete floors.}They decided to replace the concrete floors with {wooden floorboards. The houses were{rewired}and{new {units}were put in the{kitchen and {bedrooms. We were given the choice of{fires {_gas,electricity or coal.}Most of the residents chose{gas. The{roofs}on the houses were {retiled. During the time this was taking place the tenants of the houses lived in{caravans}nearby.
